NAPAD NA SKUDETO: Bliži se januar, Konte spremio listu pojačanja, ova 4 igrača stižu u Inter!
05 Nov 2019, 15:24 by Marko
Kako sada stvari stoje Inter i Juventus će do poslednjeg kola voditi borbu oko Skudeta.
„Neroazuri“ igraju odlično pod dirigentskom palicom Antonija Kontea. Bliži se januarski prelazni rok, pa je pažnja trenera Intera i sportskog direktora Đuzepea Marote usmerena ka adekvatnim pojačanjima kako bi klub, ukoliko prođe i grupnu fazu Lige šampiona bio konkurentan na sva tri fronta.
Nekadašnji strateg Juventusa sklopio je kompaktan tim u gradu mode, Inter zaista deluje impresivno. Odbrana je više nego odlična, ali Konte smatra da su mu potrebna pojačanja na desnom boku, u sredini terena, kao i u napadu.
Skauti tima sa stadiona „Đuzepe Meaca“ u nedelju su bili u Firenci gde su posmatrali duel Fjorentine i Parme, odnosno dva igrača iz ovih ekipa. Gaetana Kastrovilija i Dejana Kulešesvkog. Kastrovili je dao, ispsostaviće se odlučujući gol i doneo „ljubičastima“ bod, dok je Šveđanin makedonskog porekla opet odigrao sjajno, iako ima 19 godina. On je u Parmi na pozajmici iz Atalante.
Takođe, Konte je veliki obožavalac lika i dela Matea Darmijana koji je prethodnog leta pojačao Parmu došavši iz Mančester junajteda. Reprezentativac Italije i nekadašnji član Torina pruža zaista dobre partije pa ne čudi što ga trener Intera želi u svojim redovima.
I, četvrto pojačanje „neroazura“ biće jedan od igrača koji se već mesecima povezuju sa Interom- Nemanja Matić, Ivan Rakitić ili Arturo Vidal.
Konte prevashodno želi Čileanca. Smatra da je on idealan za njegovu taktiku. Ukoliko ne uspe da dođe do Vidala, sledeći na listi je Rakitić, pa tek onda Nemanja Matić sa kojim je sarađivao u Čelsiju.
Da li će to biti dovoljno za Skudeto saznaćemo možda već na proleće.

ATTACK ON SKUDETO: As January approaches, Conte has prepared a list of reinforcements, these 4 players are arriving at Inter!
05 Nov 2019, 15:24 by Marko
As things stand now, Inter and Juventus will lead the fight over Skudet until the last round.
The "Neroazurs" play great under Antonio Conte's conductor baton. The January deadline is approaching, so the attention of Inter coach and athletic director Giuseppe Marotta is directed to adequate reinforcements to make the club competitive on all three fronts if it passes the Champions League group stage.
A former Juventus strategist who has assembled a compact team in fashion city, Inter is really impressive. The defense is more than excellent, but Konte feels he needs reinforcements on the right flank, in the middle of the field, as well as in attack.
The scouts of the team from the stadium of Giuseppe Meaca were in Florence on Sunday watching the duel of Fiorentina and Parma, respectively two players from these teams. Gaetano Castrovilli and Dejan Kuleseski. Kastrowili gave a decisive goal and scored a purple point, while the Swede of Macedonian descent played great again, even though he was 19 years old. He is in Parma on loan from Atalanta.
Also, Conte is a big fan of the character and work of Mate Darmian, who stepped up to Parma last summer by coming from Manchester United. The Italian national team and former member of Turin provides really good games, so it is not surprising that Coach Inter wants him in their ranks.
And, the fourth reinforcement of "neroazur" will be one of the players that have been connecting with Inter for months - Nemanja Matic, Ivan Rakitic or Arturo Vidal.
Conte wants Chilean first and foremost. He thinks he is ideal for his tactics. If he fails to reach Vidal, Rakitic will be next on the list, and only then will Nemanja Matic collaborate with Chelsea.
We can find out if this will be enough for Skudeto in the spring.
